events.name: TemperatureThresholdExceeded
events.description: To alert about temperature deviations beyond acceptable levels.

events.name: TemperatureRecoveryAchieved
events.description: To inform when the temperature returns to safe levels.

events.name: SensorMalfunctionDetected
events.description: To log any detected errors in sensor functionality.

events.name: ShipmentDelayed
events.description: To dispatch notifications regarding shipment delays.

commands.name: NotifyTemperatureAlert
commands.description: To alert about temperature deviations beyond acceptable levels.

commands.name: InformTemperatureRecovery
commands.description: To inform when the temperature returns to safe levels.

commands.name: LogSensorError
commands.description: To log any detected errors in sensor functionality.

commands.name: NotifyShipmentDelay
commands.description: To dispatch notifications regarding shipment delays.

integrationPoints.name: NotificationService
integrationPoints.description: To send alerts and notifications based on events like temperature alerts and shipment delays.

integrationPoints.name: LoggingSystem
integrationPoints.description: To log sensor data and errors for monitoring and auditing purposes.
